introduction: SYNOPSISAs the circus is on its last legs, the members break up and Sung-min seeks other job . When his wife leaves him after enduring much poverty, Sung-min transforms into a man of hate and contempt. This transformation is brought on with the help of former circus buddy Chun-il. Sung-min's eyes open up to love when he meets Se-hi. Through one runaway teenage girl, Sung-min realizes how irrational he has been. At this time, Chun-il injures his brain by an accident and he is sent to a mental hospital. Sung-min is shocked by this incident. He decides to give up his dishonorable juggling act of a life and turn over a new leaf.故事马戏团是sayanggil deulja进入拆解，两者均是作为一个社会。让我们在贫穷的试验离家出走的妻子，他转变成仇恨和momyeol房子。这种转变是从天一这种马戏团的帮助下实现的。晟敏将看到他们的不法行为由一个离家出走的女孩爱上了我的眼睛睁得大大的会议与sehui。大脑是在事故中受伤的天一投入精神病院。震惊圣民是致力于睡眠停止杂耍阴暗的生活，并继续前进。
